mapper.select: select ID, POST_ID, CONTENT, USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, DELETED from ( select /*+INDEX(DOG_GATHER_COMMENT_TB IDX_DOG_GATHER_COMMENT)*/ rownum rn, POST_ID, ID, CONTENT, USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, DELETED from DOG_GATHER_COMMENT_TB where POST_ID = #{POST_ID} and ID > 0 and DELETED = 0 and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount} and DELETED = 0
select count(ID) from DOG_GATHER_COMMENT_TB where POST_ID=#{POST_ID} and DELETED = 0
mapper.update: update DOG_GATHER_COMMENT_TB set CONTENT=#{CONTENT}, UPDATED_DATE=sysdate where ID=#{ID}
update DOG_GATHER_COMMENT_TB set DELETED = 1 where ID=#{ID}
